    • draw

      public void draw​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, boolean isPressed)
      Called when user is drawing. Updates the canvas of the relevant view and calls updateOutlineSection in model to pass boundary coordinates
      Parameters:
      MouseEvent -
      Boolean - describing whether mouse is pressed for the first time

    • settingDimensionLine

      public void settingDimensionLine​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, boolean isPressed)
      Called when user is drawing. Updates the canvas of the relevant view and calculates the number of pixels from the starting and ending point of line
      Parameters:
      MouseEvent -
      Boolean - describing whether mouse is pressed for the first time

    • settingLength

      public void settingLength​(double length)
      Called after user hits enter after inputting the dimension of their line, in feet. Sets the length per pixel in model by dividing user inputted value by the number of pixels in the line
      Parameters:
      double - representing the user inputted line dimension

      Called when a button is pressed in order to determine the next screen The next action is determined by the string passed to the function
